tooltip: Run Atlas-SNP2 on a SAM or BAM file to detect SNPs from whole genome resequencing data.
Run the Atlas-Indel2 suite of tools on a SAM or BAM file to detect indels from whole genome sequencing data (current version optimized for Illumina exome capture data).
Re-genotype data produced from an Atlas-SNP2 run or a custom .snp file. This reruns Atlas-SNP2 with different parameters.
